duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain collaboration sites and programs using SharePoint online/O365.
Develop and administer SharePoint framework and sites in hybrid environments.
Work independently, prioritize effectively, multitask, and manage time appropriately.
Have basic understanding of SDLC process, performing unit testing, and deploying from lower to upper environments.
Configure SharePoint sites, utilize .NET framework (C#), IIS, and Azure Active Directory for site configuration.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (Master's preferred)
